dcterms:creator: Pedram Hosseini
Ali Ahmadian Ramaki
Hassan Maleki
Mansoureh Anvari
Seyed Abolghasem Mirroshandel
dcterms:description: SentiPers is a sentiment analysis corpus for Persian, containing customer reviews from an online shopping website. Each sentence is annotated by four native speakers with features such as polarity, keywords, and targets.
dcterms:title: SentiPers

dcterms:creator: B. Roshanfekr
S. Khadivi
M. Rahmati
dcterms:description: A Persian dataset used for sentiment analysis, which employs deep learning techniques to classify sentiments in Persian texts.
dcterms:title: Persian dataset (used by Roshanfekr et al.)

dcterms:creator: Kia Dashtipour
Mandar Gogate
Ahsan Adeel
Cosimo Ieracitano
Hadi Larijani
Amir Hussain
dcterms:description: A Persian review dataset utilized for sentiment analysis, which explores deep learning methods for classifying sentiments.
dcterms:title: Persian review dataset (used by Dashtipour et al.)
